name: SearchMailchimpMembers
description:
Search for Mailchimp list members across lists.

Search for list members in Mailchimp. This can be restricted to a specific list or used to search across all lists in an account.

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: The search query to filter list members by email, first name, or last name.

value_schema.description: The search query used to filter results. Query should be a valid email, or a string representing a contact's first or last name.

parameters.name: fields_to_return
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to return, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: fields_to_exclude
parameters.description: A comma-separated list specifying which fields to exclude from results. Use dot notation for sub-object references.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: list_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a Mailchimp list to restrict the search. Use this to specify a particular list.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the list.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query used to filter results. Query should be a valid email, or a string representing a contact's first or last name.

value_schema.description: The search query used to filter results. Query should be a valid email, or a string representing a contact's first or last name.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the list.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the list.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
